title: "Bottom Line: Pay Women The Same"
description: Hot Takedown talks to author Caitlin Murray about USWNT's lawsuit for equal pay in advance of the Women's World Cup. Also, we get lost in disastrous baseball.

itunes:author: FiveThirtyEight, 538, Neil Paine, Geoff Foster, Sara Ziegler
